title: Ben Foden unveils extravagant plans to have two wedding parties with wife Jackie
text:

Ben Foden has dished his plans to have two wedding parties with his new wife Jackie.

The X Factor : Celebrity star wasted no time following the demise of his marriage to Una Healy, 38, as he got married to Jackie just two weeks of dating.

Swept up in the excitement of his new romance, the rugby star talked about their plans to have not one but two celebrations to mark the wedding.

Also, Ben shared they will throw celebrations in Connecticut or in Manhattan and one in Cheshire.

(Image: Instagram)

He told the MailOnline : "Jackie and I are going to have a wedding party in America.

"We were thinking about doing one in America, in Connecticut or in the city in Manhattan and we're also going to do one in Cheshire in England...

"But we're planning to move back to England next summer and buy a house in Cheshire so we were thinking of having a big celebration then and bring everyone over from America and do it to celebrate our one year anniversary."

(Image: PA)

Ben was previously married to Una whom he shares two children with.

The pair married in Ireland in 2012 after four years together and went on to have children Aoife and Tadhg.

The family had been planning a move to the US for Ben's rugby career in 2018, when allegations of an affair came to light.

A year after the divorce, Ben tied the knot with US socialiate Jackie after just two weeks of dating.

Ben said there was no comparison between Una and his new wife Jackie.

He said: "Una and Jackie are two very different people.

"When I was married to Una I was very much in love with her. She's a super-talented, brilliant woman and when I met Jackie, she came to me at a time when my life was a bit all over the place."
description: The X Factor: Celebrity star Ben has big plans with his new wife Jackie to celebrate their marriage in upcoming months
